allEntities.hypothesis: That we can selectively edit the human genome to improve health and capabilities.
ethical_concerns: Permanent changes to the gene pool

allEntities.name: Gray Goo
allEntities.one_liner: A hypothetical global catastrophic scenario involving molecular nanotechnology in which out-of-control self-replicating robots consume all biomass on Earth.
allEntities.hypothesis: Self-replicating nanobots could fail to stop, converting everything into more nanobots.
implications: Earth as a featureless ball of dust

allEntities.name: Kardashev Scale
allEntities.one_liner: A method of measuring a civilization's level of technological advancement based on the amount of energy they are able to use.
allEntities.hypothesis: Civilizations can be categorized by their energy consumption: Planetary (I), Stellar (II), and Galactic (III).

allEntities.name: Lab-Grown Meat
allEntities.one_liner: Meat produced by in vitro cultivation of animal cells, instead of from slaughtered animals.
allEntities.hypothesis: Real animal tissue can be grown sustainably from stem cells.

allEntities.name: Life Extension
allEntities.one_liner: The study of slowing down or reversing the processes of aging to extend both the maximum and average lifespan.
allEntities.hypothesis: Aging is a biological process that can be managed or cured.
ethical_concerns: The meaning of life without death

allEntities.name: Matrioshka Brain
allEntities.one_liner: A hypothetical megastructure capable of processing enormous amounts of data by consuming the entire power output of a star.
allEntities.hypothesis: Computing power is limited only by the energy and matter available in a star system.

allEntities.name: Mind Uploading
allEntities.one_liner: The hypothetical process of scanning a physical structure of the brain and copying its state into a computer.
allEntities.hypothesis: Consciousness can be treated as data and transferred to new substrate.

allEntities.name: Multiverse Theory
allEntities.one_liner: The hypothetical set of all possible universes, including the universe in which we live.
allEntities.hypothesis: Our universe is just one of many, possibly infinite, universes with different physical constants or histories.
implications: Meaning of individual choice is diluted

allEntities.name: Nanobots
allEntities.one_liner: Robots whose components are at or near the scale of a nanometer.
allEntities.hypothesis: Machines can be built to manipulate matter at the molecular level.

allEntities.name: Nanotechnology
allEntities.one_liner: The manipulation of matter on an atomic, molecular, and supramolecular scale.
allEntities.hypothesis: That we can build machines and materials from the atom up.

allEntities.name: Neural Lace
allEntities.one_liner: A mesh-like electronic interface that grows with and around the brain, enabling high-bandwidth symbiotic AI connection.
bar_seeds: growing the web in the skull
allEntities.hypothesis: A flexible, injectable mesh can merge with the brain's circulatory or nervous system.
implications: Direct access to internet through thought

allEntities.name: Neuralink
allEntities.one_liner: A neurotechnology company developing implantable brain-computer interfaces (BCIs).
allEntities.hypothesis: High-bandwidth connection between the human brain and computers is possible and necessary.

allEntities.name: Nuclear Fusion
allEntities.one_liner: The process of powering the stars, harnessed on Earth to provide safe, clean, and virtually limitless energy.
allEntities.hypothesis: Fusing hydrogen isotopes to release energy without long-lived radioactive waste.

allEntities.name: Post-Human Society
allEntities.one_liner: A future social order in which the dominant beings are no longer purely biological humans.
allEntities.hypothesis: Technological evolution will create a new successor species or variety of species.
implications: End of human history as we know it

allEntities.name: Programmable Matter
allEntities.one_liner: Matter which has the ability to alter its physical properties (shape, density, moduli, conductivity, optical properties, etc.) in a programmable fashion.
allEntities.hypothesis: Information can be encoded directly into matter to control its macroscopic form.

allEntities.name: Quantum Entanglement
allEntities.one_liner: A physical phenomenon that occurs when a group of particles are generated, interact, or share spatial proximity such that the quantum state of each particle cannot be described independently of the state of the others.
bar_seeds: what happens to me happens to you
allEntities.hypothesis: Particles remain connected such that the state of one instantaneously affects the other, regardless of distance.

allEntities.name: Quantum Supremacy
allEntities.one_liner: The point where a quantum computer can solve a problem that no classical computer can solve in a reasonable amount of time.
allEntities.hypothesis: Quantum gates can perform parallel calculations impossible for classical binary bits.

allEntities.name: Simulation Point
allEntities.one_liner: The theoretical point in technological advancement where it becomes possible to create a simulation indistinguishable from reality.
allEntities.hypothesis: Computing power will eventually allow for perfect ancestor simulations.

allEntities.name: The Singularity
allEntities.one_liner: A hypothetical point in time at which technological growth becomes uncontrollable and irreversible, resulting in unfathomable changes to human civilization.
allEntities.hypothesis: That AI will eventually trigger runaway self-improvement, surpassing human intelligence.
implications: End of human history as we know it
ethical_concerns: The divide between those who ascend and those who don't

allEntities.name: Space Colonization
allEntities.one_liner: The hypothetical permanent human habitation and exploitation of natural resources outside of Earth.
allEntities.hypothesis: Humanity must expand beyond Earth to ensure long-term survival.

allEntities.name: Space Elevator
allEntities.one_liner: A proposed type of planet-to-space transportation system using a cable reaching from the surface into orbit.
allEntities.hypothesis: A cable made of carbon nanotubes can be strong enough to support an elevator to geostationary orbit.

allEntities.name: Superintelligence
allEntities.one_liner: A hypothetical agent that possesses intelligence far surpassing that of the brightest and most gifted human minds.
allEntities.hypothesis: AI will eventually surpass human cognition across all domains.

allEntities.name: Teleportation
allEntities.one_liner: The theoretical transfer of matter or energy from one point to another without traversing the physical space between them.
bar_seeds: atom to bit back to atom
allEntities.hypothesis: Information about a quantum state can be transmitted to reconstruct a particle at another location.
ethical_concerns: Is the teleported person the same person?

allEntities.name: Terraforming
allEntities.one_liner: The hypothetical process of deliberately modifying the atmosphere, temperature, surface topography, or ecology of a planet to make it habitable by humans.
allEntities.hypothesis: Planets like Mars or Venus can be engineered to support Earth-like life.

allEntities.name: The Great Filter
allEntities.one_liner: A hypothetical barrier that prevents civilizations from becoming interstellar or lasting for long periods.
angles: is it behind us or ahead
allEntities.hypothesis: There is a stage in evolution that is extremely difficult to pass, explaining why we see no aliens.

allEntities.name: Type I Civilization
allEntities.one_liner: A civilization that can use and store all of the energy available on its home planet.
allEntities.hypothesis: Humanity's next major milestone in energy consumption and technological scale.

allEntities.name: Type II Civilization
allEntities.one_liner: A civilization that can harness the total energy output of its parent star.
allEntities.hypothesis: Civilizations will eventually build structures to capture 100% of their star's output.

allEntities.name: Type III Civilization
allEntities.one_liner: A civilization that can control the energy of its entire host galaxy.
allEntities.hypothesis: The ultimate stage of technological development before crossing into trans-universal power.

allEntities.name: Vertical Farming
allEntities.one_liner: The practice of growing crops in vertically stacked layers, often incorporating controlled-environment agriculture.
allEntities.hypothesis: Food production can be brought into cities and optimized using minimal space/water.

allEntities.name: Von Neumann Probe
allEntities.one_liner: A self-replicating spacecraft designed to explore the galaxy.
allEntities.hypothesis: Autonomous machines can be sent to other star systems to build copies of themselves and continue the mission.
ethical_concerns: Resource consumption of entire star systems

allEntities.name: Wormhole
allEntities.one_liner: A speculative structure linking disparate points in spacetime, based on a special solution of the Einstein field equations.
allEntities.hypothesis: Spacetime can be warped to connect two distant points directly.

allEntities.name: Blue Hour
allEntities.one_liner: The twilight period when the sun is far below the horizon and the sky takes on a deep blue hue.
allEntities.physics_basis: Chappuis absorption of sunlight by the ozone layer.
allEntities.cultural_view: A time of introspection and transition; the 'l'heure bleue'.

allEntities.name: Burnout
allEntities.one_liner: The state of physical or emotional exhaustion involving a sense of reduced accomplishment.
allEntities.cultural_view: The dark side of 'hustle culture' and constant productivity.

allEntities.name: The Butterfly Effect
allEntities.one_liner: The phenomenon whereby a small change at one place in a complex system can have large effects elsewhere.
allEntities.cultural_view: A warning about the power of small actions and the complexity of history.

allEntities.name: Circadian Rhythm
allEntities.one_liner: The natural, internal process that regulates the sleep-wake cycle and repeats roughly every 24 hours.
allEntities.cultural_view: The foundation of health and the baseline for human daily life.

allEntities.name: Critical Mass
allEntities.one_liner: The minimum amount of fissile material needed to maintain a nuclear chain reaction; also used to describe a social tipping point.
allEntities.perception: High tension, followed by an unstoppable surge.
allEntities.cultural_view: The moment an idea or movement becomes unstoppable.

allEntities.name: Dark Energy
allEntities.one_liner: A mysterious force that is believed to make up 68% of the universe and is responsible for its accelerating expansion.
allEntities.cultural_view: The ultimate unknown factor driving the universe.

allEntities.name: Decay
allEntities.one_liner: The organic or mechanical process of breaking down over time.
allEntities.cultural_view: Symbolic of mortality, the passage of time, and lost grandeur.

allEntities.name: Déjà Vu
allEntities.one_liner: The eerie feeling that one has already experienced the present situation.
allEntities.cultural_view: Often interpreted as a sign of fate or a past life.

allEntities.name: Electricity
allEntities.one_liner: The set of physical phenomena associated with the presence and motion of matter that has a property of electric charge.
allEntities.perception: Buzzing, energetic, and foundational to modern life.
allEntities.cultural_view: Represents life, ideas, and sudden shock.

allEntities.name: Entropy
allEntities.one_liner: The thermodynamic measure of disorder and the inevitable decline into chaos.
allEntities.perception: A sense of gradual, irreversible loss and spreading randomness.
allEntities.cultural_view: Often used as a metaphor for social or personal decline.

allEntities.name: Era
allEntities.one_liner: A long and distinct period of history with a particular feature or characteristic.
allEntities.cultural_view: Used to group styles, people, and events into coherent blocks (e.g., 'Golden Era').

allEntities.name: Eternal Return
allEntities.one_liner: The philosophical concept that the universe and all existence has been recurring, and will continue to recur.
allEntities.perception: Dizzying, heavy, and potentially liberating or terrifying.
allEntities.cultural_view: A challenge to live life such that one would be happy to repeat it infinitely.

allEntities.name: Event Horizon
allEntities.one_liner: The boundary around a black hole beyond which nothing can escape.
allEntities.perception: The ultimate boundary between the known and the unknown.
allEntities.cultural_view: Used as a metaphor for irreversible life choices or absolute boundaries.

allEntities.name: Fate
allEntities.one_liner: The development of events beyond a person's control, regarded as determined by a supernatural power.
allEntities.perception: A feeling of powerlessness mixed with purpose.
allEntities.cultural_view: Often seen as a tragic or heroic burden.

allEntities.name: Flow State
allEntities.one_liner: The mental state of being fully immersed and focused on an activity, where time seems to disappear.
allEntities.perception: Hyper-focused, losing self-consciousness and the sense of time passing.
allEntities.cultural_view: Highly valued in creative and athletic pursuits; 'the zone'.

allEntities.name: Free Will
allEntities.one_liner: The ability to choose between different possible courses of action unimpeded.
allEntities.perception: A sense of autonomy and responsibility.
allEntities.cultural_view: The bedrock of legal and moral responsibility.

allEntities.name: Frequency
allEntities.one_liner: The rate at which something occurs or is repeated over a particular period of time or in a given sample.
allEntities.physics_basis: The number of cycles per unit of time (Hertz).
allEntities.cultural_view: Used metaphorically for mental state and social connection.

allEntities.name: Golden Hour
allEntities.one_liner: The period shortly after sunrise or before sunset when the light is redder and softer.
allEntities.physics_basis: Atmospheric scattering of sunlight at low angles.
allEntities.cultural_view: The peak time for photography and romanticized reflection.

allEntities.name: Gravity
allEntities.one_liner: The natural phenomenon by which all things with mass or energy are brought toward one another.
allEntities.cultural_view: Represents the 'real world', limitations, and fundamental connection.
idioms: What goes up must come down

allEntities.name: Half-Life
allEntities.one_liner: The time required for a quantity to reduce to half of its initial value.
allEntities.perception: A sense of gradual but predictable vanishing.
allEntities.cultural_view: Often associated with nuclear waste or the 'lingering' of fame or trauma.

allEntities.name: Heat Death
allEntities.one_liner: The ultimate fate of the universe in which it has evolved to a state of no thermodynamic free energy.
allEntities.perception: Total finality, absolute cold, and ultimate peace or horror.
allEntities.physics_basis: Maximization of entropy in an expanding universe.
allEntities.cultural_view: The grand finale of existence; the ultimate 'it's over'.

allEntities.name: High Noon
allEntities.one_liner: Midday, when the sun is at its highest point in the sky; a time for confrontation.
allEntities.cultural_view: The classic time for a duel; the moment of truth.

allEntities.name: Infinity
allEntities.one_liner: The state or quality of being infinite; boundless space, time, or quantity.
allEntities.cultural_view: Associated with the divine, the universe, and reincarnation.

allEntities.name: Jet Lag
allEntities.one_liner: The disruption of body rhythms caused by rapid travel across time zones.
allEntities.perception: Drowsy, confused, and physically out of sync with the environment.
allEntities.cultural_view: A status symbol of the global traveler, but a physical burden.

allEntities.name: Karma
allEntities.one_liner: The principle of cause and effect where intent and actions of an individual influence the future of that individual.
allEntities.perception: A sense of cosmic justice and inevitability.
allEntities.cultural_view: Universal belief in 'you reap what you sow'.

allEntities.name: Kinetic Energy
allEntities.one_liner: The energy an object possesses due to its motion.
allEntities.perception: Active, powerful, and dangerous if interrupted.
allEntities.cultural_view: Symbolizes progress, action, and the power of doing.

allEntities.name: Light Waves
allEntities.one_liner: Electromagnetic radiation that can be perceived by the human eye.
allEntities.cultural_view: Represents knowledge, truth, and hope.

allEntities.name: Magnetism
allEntities.one_liner: A physical phenomenon produced by the motion of electric charge, resulting in attractive and repulsive forces.
allEntities.perception: Unseen but undeniable force pulling things together or pushing them apart.
allEntities.cultural_view: Commonly used to describe charisma or intense relationships.
idioms: Drawn like a moth to a flame

allEntities.name: Momentum
allEntities.one_liner: The quantity of motion of a moving body, measured as a product of its mass and velocity.
allEntities.cultural_view: Valued in business, sports, and creative output.

allEntities.name: Nuclear Energy
allEntities.one_liner: The energy released during nuclear fission or fusion, especially when used to generate electricity.
allEntities.physics_basis: Fission or fusion of atomic nuclei.
allEntities.cultural_view: Associated with both the progress of the atomic age and the fear of extinction.

allEntities.name: Perpetual Motion
allEntities.one_liner: Motion of ad-infinitum devices that can continue to do work indefinitely without an external energy source.
allEntities.physics_basis: Violates the First or Second Law of Thermodynamics.
allEntities.cultural_view: A symbol of the search for the impossible and eternal efficiency.

allEntities.name: Potential Energy
allEntities.one_liner: The energy possessed by a body by virtue of its position relative to others, stresses within itself, electric charge, and other factors.
allEntities.physics_basis: Energy stored in an object due to its position or state (U = mgh).
allEntities.cultural_view: Metaphor for talent or opportunity that has yet to be used.

allEntities.name: Quantum Leap
allEntities.one_liner: An abrupt, non-linear transition from one state to another without passing through intermediate stages.
allEntities.cultural_view: A metaphor for huge progress or change in a short time.

allEntities.name: Resonance
allEntities.one_liner: The quality in a sound of being deep, full, and reverberating.
allEntities.perception: Deep connection, physical vibration, and lasting impact.
allEntities.physics_basis: When a system vibrates at its natural frequency due to an external force.
allEntities.cultural_view: Metaphor for ideas that 'land' or people who connect deeply.

allEntities.name: Solar Energy
allEntities.one_liner: Radiant light and heat from the Sun that is harnessed using a range of technologies.
allEntities.cultural_view: Symbol of sustainability and the optimistic future.

allEntities.name: Sound Waves
allEntities.one_liner: A wave of compression and rarefaction, by which sound is propagated in an elastic medium such as air.
allEntities.cultural_view: The medium of music and voice; the power of the word.

allEntities.name: Stasis
allEntities.one_liner: A period or state of inactivity or equilibrium.
allEntities.cultural_view: Can be seen as either meditative peace or death-like stagnation.

allEntities.name: Static
allEntities.one_liner: Background noise, interference, or a state of unchanging energy.
allEntities.perception: Constant, potentially irritating, or oddly comforting (as white noise).
allEntities.cultural_view: Associated with dead air, lost connections, and the 'void'.

allEntities.name: Synchronicity
allEntities.one_liner: The simultaneous occurrence of events that appear significantly related but have no discernible causal connection.
allEntities.physics_basis: Jungian theory of acausal connecting principle.
allEntities.cultural_view: Interpreted as the universe sending a message or sign.

allEntities.name: Temporal Paradox
allEntities.one_liner: A logical contradiction resulting from time travel, where an event prevents its own cause.
allEntities.cultural_view: A staple of science fiction used to explore cause and effect.

allEntities.name: The Big Bang
allEntities.one_liner: The rapid expansion of matter from a state of extremely high density and temperature that marked the origin of the universe.
allEntities.cultural_view: The ultimate scientific origin story.

allEntities.name: The Future
allEntities.one_liner: The time that is to come; the time after the present.
allEntities.physics_basis: The region of spacetime ahead of the present moment.
allEntities.cultural_view: Associated with progress, technological advancement, and destiny.
idioms: The best is yet to come

allEntities.name: The Past
allEntities.one_liner: The set of all events that occurred before a given point in time.
allEntities.physics_basis: The region of spacetime behind the present moment.
allEntities.cultural_view: Associated with history, lessons, and ancestors.

allEntities.name: The Present
allEntities.one_liner: The time that is associated with the events perceived directly and in the first time.
allEntities.physics_basis: The current point on the world-line of an observer.
allEntities.cultural_view: Valued in mindfulness and carpe diem philosophies.

allEntities.name: The Speed of Light
allEntities.one_liner: The universal speed limit, roughly 300,000 kilometers per second.
allEntities.cultural_view: The ultimate benchmark for speed and technical perfection.

allEntities.name: Tidal Force
allEntities.one_liner: The effect of the gravitational pull of one body on another, resulting in the regular rise and fall of sea levels.
allEntities.cultural_view: Metaphor for the changing of fortunes and the power of the moon.

allEntities.name: Time Dilation
allEntities.one_liner: The difference in the elapsed time as measured by two clocks, either due to a relative velocity between them or to a difference in gravitational potential between their locations.
bar_seeds: minute for me year for you
allEntities.hypothesis: Time is relative, not absolute, and can be stretched by speed or mass.
implications: One-way time travel to the future

allEntities.name: Vibration
allEntities.one_liner: An instance of vibrating; a person's emotional state, the atmosphere of a place, or the associations of an object.
allEntities.physics_basis: Mechanical oscillations about an equilibrium point.
allEntities.cultural_view: Central to 'vibe' culture and various spiritual beliefs about energy.

allEntities.name: Wind Energy
allEntities.one_liner: The use of wind to provide mechanical power through wind turbines to turn electric generators.
allEntities.physics_basis: Conversion of wind's kinetic energy to mechanical power.
allEntities.cultural_view: Symbol of man working with nature's forces.

allEntities.name: Witching Hour
allEntities.one_liner: A time of night associated with supernatural events, traditionally midnight or 3 AM.
allEntities.perception: Eerie, quiet, and heavy with potential dread or revelation.
allEntities.cultural_view: The time when the veil between worlds is thinnest.

allEntities.name: Zero Point Energy
allEntities.one_liner: The lowest possible energy that a quantum mechanical system may have.
allEntities.perception: A sense of infinite potential hidden in nothingness.
allEntities.cultural_view: Often featured in sci-fi as a source of clean, infinite power.

allEntities.name: Aston Martin DB5
allEntities.one_liner: The most famous car in the world, forever linked to James Bond.
allEntities.cultural_status: The eternal symbol of cinematic espionage and British class.

allEntities.name: Bentley Continental GT
allEntities.one_liner: The definitive grand tourer, blending massive power with gentlemanly luxury.
allEntities.cultural_status: A staple of high-net-worth garages and rap lyrics.

allEntities.name: Bugatti Veyron
allEntities.one_liner: A masterpiece of engineering that redefined the limits of road-car performance and speed.
allEntities.cultural_status: A symbol of ultimate automotive achievement and extreme wealth.

allEntities.name: Cadillac Escalade
allEntities.one_liner: The massive American luxury SUV that defined early 2000s bling culture.
allEntities.cultural_status: The VIP transport of choice for rappers and executives alike.

allEntities.name: Cadillac Fleetwood
allEntities.one_liner: A classic American luxury sedan representing old-school prestige and comfort.
allEntities.cultural_status: An icon of 20th-century American luxury and a favorite for custom lowriders.

allEntities.name: Checker Taxi
allEntities.one_liner: The iconic yellow cab that defined New York City streets for decades.
allEntities.cultural_status: The universal symbol of NYC urban life.

allEntities.name: Chevrolet Impala '64
allEntities.one_liner: The quintessential lowrider canvas, immortalized by West Coast hip-hop.
allEntities.cultural_status: The official car of West Coast G-Funk.

allEntities.name: DeLorean DMC-12
allEntities.one_liner: A stainless steel sports car with gull-wing doors, famous for traveling through time.
allEntities.cultural_status: A pop culture icon thanks to Back to the Future.

allEntities.name: Dodge Challenger Hellcat
allEntities.one_liner: A modern muscle car defined by excessive horsepower and tire smoke.
allEntities.cultural_status: The modern street king of sheer displacement and noise.

allEntities.name: Ducati Panigale V4
allEntities.one_liner: A high-tech Italian superbike that brings MotoGP performance to the street.
allEntities.cultural_status: The Ferrari of two wheels.

allEntities.name: Ferrari F40
allEntities.one_liner: A legendary mid-engine, rear-wheel drive sports car that redefined performance in the late 80s.
allEntities.cultural_status: Regarded as one of the greatest supercars ever made; a collector's dream.

allEntities.name: Ford Bronco (1st Gen)
allEntities.one_liner: A rugged, boxy off-roader that became a classic American SUV icon.
allEntities.cultural_status: A collector's item representing rugged individualism.

allEntities.name: Ford Mustang GT
allEntities.one_liner: The pony car that started it all, representing accessible American speed.
allEntities.cultural_status: A symbol of American freedom and teenage rebellion.

allEntities.name: Gulfstream G650
allEntities.one_liner: The ultimate ultra-long-range business jet for the global elite.
allEntities.cultural_status: The gold standard of billionaire travel (referenced incorrectly as 'G6' often).

allEntities.name: Harley-Davidson Fat Boy
allEntities.one_liner: The muscular cruiser made famous by the Terminator.
allEntities.cultural_status: The symbol of American heavyweight cruising.

allEntities.name: Lamborghini Aventador
allEntities.one_liner: A mid-engine supercar that epitomizes aggressive design, extreme performance, and wealth.
allEntities.cultural_status: Top-tier status symbol in hip-hop and business.

allEntities.name: Lamborghini Countach
allEntities.one_liner: The wedge-shaped poster car that defined the 80s supercar aesthetic.
allEntities.cultural_status: The archetype of the 'bedroom wall' poster car.

allEntities.name: Learjet 23
allEntities.one_liner: The pioneer of the private business jet industry.
allEntities.cultural_status: The original symbol of corporate success.

allEntities.name: Lowrider
allEntities.one_liner: A customized vehicle, typically a classic American car, with a lowered chassis and hydraulic suspension.
allEntities.cultural_status: An iconic symbol of Chicano and West Coast hip-hop culture.

allEntities.name: Maybach 62
allEntities.one_liner: An ultra-luxury chauffeur-driven limousine known for its fully reclining rear seats.
allEntities.cultural_status: The ultimate symbol of early 2000s rap opulence.

allEntities.name: McLaren F1
allEntities.one_liner: The gold-standard 90s supercar with a central driving position and gold-lined engine bay.
allEntities.cultural_status: The greatest analog supercar ever built.

allEntities.name: Mercedes-Benz G-Wagon
allEntities.one_liner: A luxury SUV that combines military-grade durability with high-end status and performance.
allEntities.cultural_status: Highly popular among celebrities and the wealthy for its imposing presence.

allEntities.name: Nissan Skyline GT-R R34
allEntities.one_liner: Godzilla. The technologically advanced JDM masterpiece forbidden in the US for decades.
allEntities.cultural_status: The ultimate forbidden fruit of car culture.

allEntities.name: Porsche 911
allEntities.one_liner: The definitive rear-engine sports car, known for its timeless design and precision engineering.
allEntities.cultural_status: An icon of taste and engineering excellence.

allEntities.name: Range Rover
allEntities.one_liner: The definitive luxury SUV, combining British elegance with serious off-road capability.
allEntities.cultural_status: A staple of high-end suburban and celebrity lifestyle.

allEntities.name: Rolls-Royce Phantom
allEntities.one_liner: The absolute pinnacle of automotive luxury and a symbol of ultimate success.
allEntities.cultural_status: The gold standard for luxury and achievement.

allEntities.name: Tesla Cybertruck
allEntities.one_liner: A polarizing, stainless steel electric polygon straight out of a dystopian future.
allEntities.cultural_status: A meme, a status symbol, and a brutalist statement piece.

allEntities.name: Tesla Model S
allEntities.one_liner: The electric sedan that brought sustainable performance and high-tech luxury to the mainstream.
allEntities.cultural_status: A symbol of tech-forward wealth and innovation.

allEntities.name: Toyota Supra MK4
allEntities.one_liner: The 90s JDM legend, famous for its bulletproof 2JZ engine and massive tuning potential.
allEntities.cultural_status: Street racing icon made immortal by Fast & Furious.

allEntities.name: Vespa
allEntities.one_liner: The classic Italian scooter synonymous with style and urban mobility.
allEntities.cultural_status: An icon of Italian design and mod culture.

allEntities.name: AK-47
allEntities.one_liner: The most widely used and recognizable assault rifle in the world, a symbol of both revolution and street power.
allEntities.symbolism: Revolution, resistance, and raw street power.

allEntities.name: Analog Clock
allEntities.one_liner: A device for measuring and showing time, characterized by moving hands and a numbered face.
allEntities.symbolism: Inevitability, mortality, pressure, and organization.

allEntities.name: AR-15
allEntities.one_liner: The modular and highly popular semi-automatic rifle platform in the United States.
allEntities.symbolism: Modern warfare, tactical precision, and social controversy.

allEntities.name: Balaclava
allEntities.one_liner: A cloth headgear that conceals identity, leaving only the eyes as witnesses.
allEntities.symbolism: Mystery, criminal intent, and the loss of individual identity in the collective.

allEntities.name: Baseball Bat
allEntities.one_liner: A sporting tool repurposed for heavy-duty blunt force.
allEntities.symbolism: Enforcement, direct consequences, and American grit.

allEntities.name: Bo Staff
